title: Homeopathic Remedies
description: Shop our Weleda range of certified natural homeopathic remedies and homeopathic medicines
cleaned_text: a holistic approach to good health stimulating the body's natural ability to cure itself. Its guiding principle is to choose a remedy that would produce similar symptoms to those you wish to treat. Each remedy is created by a series of dilution and shaking processes to produce a minimum 'potentised' dose.
